title: Short-Term Course for Improving Second Language Writing Skills Using Data-Driven Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Blended learning emphasizing group collaboration and self-directed learning using corpus data and digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can improve surface-level errors (grammar/spelling) and semantic errors (coherence/development) in writing by over 30% by analyzing corpus-based materials
Learners can complete at least three writing revision cycles using a hybrid strategy combining peer feedback and corpus data
Learners can resolve over 80% of writing process issues using metacognitive strategies (self-questioning checklists) and affective strategies (peer collaboration)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
